  • public class HandEvaluatorTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the most complicated and involved test class that is where is really bash on the system as a whole.
    Author:
    mrmcduff

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testEvaluate

        public void testEvaluate()
        This is the ultimate test for this project. Tests every kind of hand at least once for proper evaluation and selection of the right card set/s. We try short hands, long hands, hands that span an entire deck, hands with a joker, and hands without. Test method for HandEvaluator.evaluate(com.mishmash.rally.Hand).

      • testSortHand

        public void testSortHand()
        Tests our ability to properly simplify a hand. Test method for HandEvaluator.sortHand(com.mishmash.rally.Hand).

      • testSortBadHand

        public void testSortBadHand()
        Ensures that we properly handle bad hands.

      • testSortComplicatedHand

        public void testSortComplicatedHand()
        Sorts a pretty complicated hand. This is a bit of an edge case.

      • testGetBestCollection

        public void testGetBestCollection()
        Tests getting the best collection hand. Test method for HandEvaluator.getBestCollection(com.mishmash.rally.HandEvaluator.SimplifiedHand).

      • testGetBestStraight

        public void testGetBestStraight()
        Tests getting the best straight. Test method for HandEvaluator.getBestStraight(com.mishmash.rally.HandEvaluator.SimplifiedHand).

      • testWildStaights

        public void testWildStaights()
        Tests getting straights when wild cards are involved. This is a more complicated case and worth testing seperately.

      • testJokerGapRegression

        public void testJokerGapRegression()
        Tests for a regression that caused an infinite loop due to how I was handling the need to back up and try again when looking for straights with holes.

      • testGetCorrectStraightFlushRegression

        public void testGetCorrectStraightFlushRegression()
        Tests for regression of a bugfix. The old bug would skip one ahead if we had a wild card in this instance and return a straight of { 6s, 5s, 4s, 3s }.

      • testGetBestFlush

        public void testGetBestFlush()
        Tests getting the best flush from various types of hands. Test method for HandEvaluator.getBestFlush(com.mishmash.rally.HandEvaluator.SimplifiedHand).

      • testGetBestStraightFlush

        public void testGetBestStraightFlush()
        Tests getting the best straight flush. Test method for HandEvaluator.getBestStraightFlush(com.mishmash.rally.HandEvaluator.SimplifiedHand).
